EmailTemplate.description: To send post-installation to set up the Customer Satisfaction Survey and/or Portal Training
EmailTemplate.name: Checking in from Borrego Solar
EmailTemplate.subject: Checking in from Borrego Solar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I'm Tommy Sunderland, the Customer Experience Manager for Borrego Solar - I work closely with PROJECT DEVELOPER and PROJECT MANAGER. As the customer advocate for the company I always check in a few months after each system has been commissioned to see how things went, solicit feedback and ensure that any loose ends have been wrapped up. I noticed the installation for PROJECT NAME went live on PTO DATE and wanted to set up a time to discuss by phone the items below as well as any other thoughts/comments you may have: - Did the project go as planned and are you happy with the result? - Did you receive closeout documentation, including electrical drawings, warranty information and safety manuals? - Have you been introduced to the data monitoring system that allows you to track system production online? - Do you have any other questions? Or is there anything else you'd like me to know?
Additionally, we offer a free customer portal that includes detailed system information, electronic versions of your closeout documents, a link to real-time production monitoring and a case management system that allows you submit and track cases online anytime day or night. If this is something you'd be interested in, let me know and I can get you set up on the portal.
I'll follow up on these items with a call next week - if there's a day and time that works best for you, let me know and I'll do my best to accommodate.
I look forward to speaking with you soon, Tommy
Tommy Sunderland
Customer Experience Manager
Borrego Solar Systems, Inc.
360 22nd Street, Suite 600 Oakland, CA 94612 P. 510-496-8710 F. 888-843-6778
www.borregosolar.com
